bug.author: dethard
bug.description: box.train (and box.train.stderr) exit with no action since commits from 17-Dec-2015 (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/commit/c2f5e9b8498df42db955cf755c513e8e3bb34112>c2f5e9b</denchmark-link> +a20156fc, updates in api/tesseractmain.cpp). No renderer is created for this configuration.

comments.comment: I will check this next week.
